entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of ice pellets or snow beginning this evening then changing to periods of snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
